# InControl Desktop

> Privacy-first local LLM chat for Windows — WinUI 3, RTX-accelerated, multi-backend

## Overview

InControl Desktop is a native Windows chat application that runs large language models entirely on-device. No cloud, no API keys for core functionality. Built with WinUI 3 and Fluent Design, targeting NVIDIA RTX workstations.

## Quick Start

```
# Prerequisites: Ollama running locally
ollama pull llama3.2
ollama serve

# From source
git clone https://github.com/mcp-tool-shop-org/InControl-Desktop.git
cd InControl-Desktop
dotnet restore
dotnet build
dotnet run --project src/InControl.App
```

## NuGet Packages

- `InControl.Core` — Domain models, conversation types, shared abstractions
- `InControl.Inference` — LLM backend abstraction with streaming chat and model management (includes Ollama implementation)

## API Entry Points

```csharp
// Streaming chat via InControl.Inference
var client = inferenceClientFactory.Create("ollama");
await foreach (var token in client.StreamChatAsync(messages))
{
    Console.Write(token);
}
```

## Architecture

```
InControl.App (WinUI 3)       → UI layer
InControl.ViewModels           → Presentation (MVVM, CommunityToolkit.Mvvm)
InControl.Services             → Business logic
InControl.Inference            → LLM backends (Ollama, llama.cpp)
InControl.Core                 → Shared types
```

## Constraints

- Windows only (WinUI 3 / Windows App SDK 1.6)
- Requires .NET 9.0
- GPU: minimum RTX 3060 (8GB), recommended RTX 4080/5080 (16GB)
- Build via Visual Studio (CLI `dotnet build` hits MSB4062 PRI error)
- App project must target x64; class libraries use AnyCPU

## Data Storage

All data is local:
- Sessions: `%LOCALAPPDATA%\InControl\sessions\`
- Logs: `%LOCALAPPDATA%\InControl\logs\`
- Cache: `%LOCALAPPDATA%\InControl\cache\`
- Exports: `%USERPROFILE%\Documents\InControl\exports\`
